channel.title: Javascript on nodejh
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on nodejh

item.title: Is JavaScript a call by reference or call by value language?
item.description: 1. 例子 先来看两个个来自于 《JavaScript 高级程序设计》P70-P71 的两个例子。 1.1. 基本类型参数传递 function addTen(num) { num += 10; return num; } var count = 20; var result = addTen(count); alert(count);
